original_text: King Solomon gave the queen of Sheba all she desired and asked for; he gave her more than she had brought to him. Then she left and returned with her retinue to her own country.
korean_text: 솔로몬 왕이 스바 여왕이 가져온 대로 답례하고 그 외에 또 그의 소원대로 구하는 것을 모두 주니 이에 그가 그의 신하들과 더불어 본국으로 돌아갔더라

sentences.original_text: King Solomon gave the queen of Sheba
all she desired and asked for
he gave her more than she had brought to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그녀가 자신에게 가져온 것보다 더 많이 주었다

sentences.original_text: with her retinue to her own country
